title: London Stock Exchange
summary: London Stock Exchange is a stock exchange in the City of London, England. As of March 2021, the total market value of all companies trading on the London Stock Exchange was £3.8 trillion.[3] It was founded in 1801, making it one of the oldest exchanges in the world.[4] Its current premises are situated in Paternoster Square close to St Paul's Cathedral in the City of London. It is part of London Stock Exchange Group (LSEG). London Stock Exchange Group was created in October 2007 when London Stock Exchange merged with Milan Stock Exchange, Borsa Italiana.[5]
